languages.text: {n}Идира смотрит на вас безумными глазами, держась за раны на голове. Сначала она только шевелит губами, затем хрипло откашливается и шепчет.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, это... действительно ты?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира смотрит на вас безумными глазами, держась за раны на голове. Сначала она только шевелит губами, затем хрипло откашливается и шепчет.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, это... действительно ты?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira stares at you with crazed eyes while clutching the wounds on her head. At first, no sound comes out of her moving lips, then she coughs weakly and whispers,{/n} "Lord Captain, is it... really you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира смотрит на вас безумными глазами, держась за раны на голове. Сначала она только шевелит губами, затем хрипло откашливается и шепчет.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, это... действительно ты?"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Indira stares at you with crazed eyes while clutching the wounds on her head. At first, no sound comes out of her moving lips, then she coughs weakly and whispers,{/n} "Lord Captain, is it... really you?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira stares at you with crazed eyes while clutching the wounds on her head. At first, no sound comes out of her moving lips, then she coughs weakly and whispers,{/n} "Lord Captain, is it... really you?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉用疯狂的眼神看着你，捂着头上的伤口。一开始，她的嘴唇翕动着，没有发出任何声音。随后，她无力地咳嗽起来，轻声问道。{/n}“舰长大人……这……真的是你吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you with crazed eyes while clutching the wounds on her head. At first, no sound comes out of her moving lips, then she coughs weakly and whispers,{/n} "Lord Captain, is it... really you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉用疯狂的眼神看着你，捂着头上的伤口。一开始，她的嘴唇翕动着，没有发出任何声音。随后，她无力地咳嗽起来，轻声问道。{/n}“舰长大人……这……真的是你吗？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira te observa con ojos enloquecidos mientras se toca las heridas de la cabeza. Al principio, sus labios se mueven sin hacer sonido, pero después tose débilmente y susurra:{/n} «Lord Capitán, es... ¿es usted de verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you with crazed eyes while clutching the wounds on her head. At first, no sound comes out of her moving lips, then she coughs weakly and whispers,{/n} "Lord Captain, is it... really you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira te observa con ojos enloquecidos mientras se toca las heridas de la cabeza. Al principio, sus labios se mueven sin hacer sonido, pero después tose débilmente y susurra:{/n} «Lord Capitán, es... ¿es usted de verdad?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは頭の傷を押さえながら、狂ったような目であなたを見つめている。最初は動く唇から何の音も出なかったが、やがて弱々しく咳き込み、こう囁いた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、本当に…あなたなの？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you with crazed eyes while clutching the wounds on her head. At first, no sound comes out of her moving lips, then she coughs weakly and whispers,{/n} "Lord Captain, is it... really you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは頭の傷を押さえながら、狂ったような目であなたを見つめている。最初は動く唇から何の音も出なかったが、やがて弱々しく咳き込み、こう囁いた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、本当に…あなたなの？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira starrt dich mit wahnsinnigen Augen an, während sie gegen die Wunden an ihrem Kopf schlägt. Anfangs dringt kein Geräusch aus ihren zuckenden Lippen, dann hustet sie schwach und flüstert:{/n} "Lord Captain, seid das ... wirklich Ihr?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you with crazed eyes while clutching the wounds on her head. At first, no sound comes out of her moving lips, then she coughs weakly and whispers,{/n} "Lord Captain, is it... really you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira starrt dich mit wahnsinnigen Augen an, während sie gegen die Wunden an ihrem Kopf schlägt. Anfangs dringt kein Geräusch aus ihren zuckenden Lippen, dann hustet sie schwach und flüstert: {/n}Lord Captain, sei das ... wirklich Ihr?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les mains plaquées sur son crâne meurtri, Idira vous fixe d'un regard éperdu. Elle tente d'articuler quelques mots sans que le moindre son ne sorte de sa bouche, puis elle s'éclaircit la gorge et murmure :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... c'est bien vous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you with crazed eyes while clutching the wounds on her head. At first, no sound comes out of her moving lips, then she coughs weakly and whispers,{/n} "Lord Captain, is it... really you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mains plaquées sur son crâne meurtri, Idira vous fixe d'un regard éperdu. Elle tente d'articuler quelques mots sans que le moindre son ne sorte de sa bouche, puis elle s'éclaircit la gorge et murmure :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... c'est bien vous ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, başındaki yaralara dokunurken sana çıldırmış bir bakış atıyor. Titreyen dudaklarından önce bir ses gelmiyor, daha sonra güçsüzce öksürüp fısıldıyor. {/n} "Gerçekten sen misin Lord Kaptan?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira stares at you with crazed eyes while clutching the wounds on her head. At first, no sound comes out of her moving lips, then she coughs weakly and whispers,{/n} "Lord Captain, is it... really you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira başındaki yaralara dokunurken sana çıldırmış bir bakış atıyor. Titreyen dudaklarından önce bir ses gelmiyor, daha sonra güçsüzce öksürüyor ve fısıldıyor. {/n} "Gerçekten sen misin Lord Kaptan?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
